dmca.title: DMCA Notification of Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry [mailto:bernardine3@bernardine.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2007 12:28 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Notification of Infringement

From:

Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry
4333 Homer Avenue
Cincinnati, Ohio 45227
513-561-3057
dmca@bernardine.com


To:

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite #110
Dallas, TX 75027
214-782-7800
Fax: 214-782-7801
copyright@theplanet.com

Re:

http://www.zulumoon.com


1. The Original Work:

http://www.bernardine.com/images/archived/malachite_ring1sm.jpg


2. The Infringing Material:
http://www.zulumoon.com/gemstones.asp
http://www.zulumoon.com/results_subGemstone.asp?tCatID=ank&tCollectionID
=73
http://www.zulumoon.com/results_subGemstone.asp?tCatID=EA&tCollectionID=
73
http://www.zulumoon.com/results_subGemstone.asp?tCatID=NK&tCollectionID=
73
http://www.zulumoon.com/results_subGemstone.asp?tCatID=PN&tCollectionID=
73
http://www.zulumoon.com/results_subGemstone.asp?tCatID=SR&tCollectionID=
73

The infringing web site copied our image for monetary gain.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
/S/: [Nancy Bernardine]
Nancy Bernardine
Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry
http://www.bernardine.com
